MainItem.Title: Lt.-Col.
MainItem.Text: (placed on h.p. list on completion of four years' ssrvice as Regtl. Lt.Col.) Kephala, temp. Lt. A. G. (rel. commn. on completion of service and retains rank of Lt.)... Ker, Ma]. Lord A. R. Innes, D.S.O., see Innes-Ker, Maj. Lord A. R., D.S-O. Kernen, temp. 2nd Lt. H. G. (rel. commn. on completion of service and retains rank of 2nd Lt.) Kernighan, temp. 2nd Lt. A. E. (rel. commn. on completion of service and retains rank of 2nd Lt.) ..: Kerns, temp. Qrmr. and Capt. G., D.C.M. (rel. commn. on completion of service and retains rank of Capt,)

MainItem.Title: temp.
MainItem.Text: 2nd Lt, F. F. (rel. commn. on completion of service and retains rank of 2nd Lt.) Kerry, temp. Lt. F. C. (rel. commii. on completion of service and retains rank of Lt.) ... ... Kersey, temp. 2nd Lt. N. E. (rel. commn. on completion of service and retains rank of 2nd Lt.) Kershaw, temp. 2nd Lt. H. E. (rel. commn. on completion of service and retains rank of 2nd Lt.) ... Kessels, temp. 2nd Lt. S. H. (rel. commn. on completion of service and retains rank of 2nd Lt.)
